      • scanINT

        public int scanINT(int min,
                   int max,
                   int type)
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum point (useless with type 0 or 3)
        max - the maximum point (useless with type 0 or 3)
        type - choose the type
        type 0 = without less or more
        type 1 = with less and more
        type 0 = with less no more
        type 3 = no less but with more
        Returns:
        the value integer selected

      • scanDOUBLE

        Returns:
        the value DOUBLE selected

      • scanDOUBLE

                         double max,
                         int type)
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum point (useless with type 0 or 3)
        max - the maximum point (useless with type 0 or 3)
        type - choose the type
        type 0 = without less or more
        type 1 = with less and more
        type 0 = with less no more
        type 3 = no less but with more
        Returns:
        the value integer selected
